title: WebQoof: No, Sambit Patra Didn’t Call Protesting Farmers ‘Gaddar’
subtitle: Fake News: A graphic attributing a fake quote on protesting farmers to Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP)’s National Spokesperson Sambit Patra is being shared on social media. Patra took to Twitter to debunk the fake image himself.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
On magnifying the image, it is clear that the picture has been manipulated by adding text.

While the topic band at the top says ‘BJP’s press conference LIVE’ it has a picture of Congress president Rahul Gandhi.
